meanings.definition: A North American plant with pink roots used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The pinkroots have healing properties that can be beneficial for various ailments.
meanings.sent2: I harvested some pinkroots from the forest to make herbal remedies.
meanings.sent3: The pinkroots decided to start their own herbal medicine business.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists believe that pinkroots are the hidden gems of nature's pharmacy.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant pink color of the roots makes pinkroots easy to spot in the wild.

meanings.definition: The pink roots of the North American plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Pinkroots are often dried and ground into powder for medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent2: The pinkroots' unique flavor adds a special touch to herbal teas.
meanings.sent3: The pinkroots threw a party to celebrate their beneficial properties.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of green, the pinkroots stood out like beacons of health.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of pinkroots filled the room, calming everyone instantly.
